components.name: screen_hot_mirror
components.notes: Dichroic filter to reflect visible light and pass infrared light; used to combine IR illumination with visible stimulus on the same screen.

lick_spouts.name: lick_spout
lick_spouts.notes: Lick spout for water delivery, the tube is ordered from McMaster, cut to size and shaped by AIND

motorized_stage.notes: This stage is driven by the manipulator device.

acquisition.notes: Easy insertion. PIR may be at channels 110-116. Confusion about cortical surface vs. liquid surface. Measurements based on 2nd zero. 1st zero was 556 above (insert z 3459)
